original_text: The Son of Man goes as it is written of him, but woe to that man by whom the Son of Man is betrayed! It would have been better for that man if he had not been born.”
korean_text: 인자는 자기에 대하여 기록된 대로 가거니와 인자를 파는 그 사람에게는 화가 있으리로다 그 사람은 차라리 태어나지 아니하였더라면 제게 좋을 뻔하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The Son of Man goes as it is written of him
sentences.korean_translation: 인자는 자기에 대해 기록된 대로 갑니다

sentences.original_text: by whom the Son of Man is betrayed
It would have been better for that man
if he had not been born
